tagline_es: Desperdiciar el tiempo en lo que amas no es perderlo, es vivirlo.
tagline_en: Wasting time on what you love isn't losing it, it's living it.
about_es: Somos cinco amigos que comparten un amor por la música. No buscamos impresionar, buscamos conectar. Nuestra historia está hecha de ensayos, carcajadas y noches que se sienten eternas.
about_en: We are five friends who share a love for music. We don't seek to impress, we seek to connect. Our story is made of rehearsals, laughter and nights that feel eternal.
